text: The Symphony in C Major a symphony by Richard Wagner. It is the only complete symphony written by him. It was written in 1832. == Structure == The symphony has four movements: # Sostenuto e maestoso â€“ Allegro con brio # Andante ma non troppo, un poco maestoso # Allegro assai (447 bars) # Allegro molto e vivace. == References == Category:Compositions by Richard Wagner Wagner Symphony in C Category:Compositions in C major
title: Symphony in C major (Wagner)
